desc: All GR8CASE phone cases are built-to-order in our state of the art facility in Delaware, USA. We make custom fitted cases for iPhone, Samsung, Google Pixel, LG and Moto phones. Each phone case is handcrafted with natural wood that is precision cut, hand sanded to a smooth finish and hand polished.

layout.text: WOOD PHONE CASES - HANDCRAFTED IN USA

PERFECT GIFT
AVAILABLE FOR OVER 40 PHONE MODELS
